name: TextDrawUseBox
notes: If the textdraw is already shown, it must be re-shown (TextDrawShowForAll/TextDrawShowForPlayer) to show the changes of this function.
description: Toggle whether a textdraw uses a box or not.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the text textdraw to toggle the box of.

params_body.name: use
params_body.description: 1 to show a box or 0 to not show a box.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the textdraw specified does not exist.
